mapper.insert: insert into employee (employeeID, employeeName, password, mailAdress ) values (#{employeeID}, #{employeeName}, #{password}, #{mailAdress} )
mapper.update: update employee set employeeName= #{employeeName}, status = #{status}, sex = #{sex}, epType = #{epType}, birthday = #{birthday}, age = #{age}, joinedDate = #{joinedDate}, joinedTime = #{joinedTime}, postCode = #{postCode}, address = #{address}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, authority = #{authority}, mailAdress = #{mailAdress}, insertDate = date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d'), updateDate = date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') where employeeID = #{employeeID}
mapper.select: select MAX(employeeID) from ems.employee WHERE employeeID LIKE 'E%' ;
